title: BBC Local Live: Norfolk on Wednesday, 22 June 2016 - BBC News
summary: missing norfolk man sam alger , 25 , found dead near spanish nightclub .
norwich city away at blackburn in first game of the season .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume on thursday at 08:00 .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: today our main story has been on the death in spain of sam alger from necton , near swaffham .
mr alger , 25 , had been at an elrow club night at a venue on the outskirts of barcelona , before he disappeared .
his body was discovered by spanish police yesterday in fields close to the club and an autopsy is under way .
reports on social media suggest an altercation took place outside the venue after the event was over , police say there are investigating to see if there is any connection with mr alger 's death .
in happier news , a treehouse recommended for destruction by planners because it did n't have planning permission has been saved by councillors .
we also revealed norwich city 's new fixtures from the forthcoming season .
have a good evening .
the team are back from 08:00 tomorrow .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Local Live

documents.title: next time you go for a coffee
text: you could be sitting next to a top author !
alex scarrow , best known for his fantasy book series , time riders , lives in norwich with his family and says he likes likes to write his novels in one of the city 's coffee shops .
`` i used to write at home , but i got terribly lonely , '' he says .
`` my routine tends to be a large cappuccino and a triple chocolate muffin , and , by the time both have gone , i 've usually written 1,500 words - and then it 's back home to put up a shelf . ''

documents.title: weather : warm , humid with thundery showers
text: it 'll be warm and humid this evening with some hazy sunshine .
the night will be muggy but will probably stay dry .
some heavy , thundery showers could affect some parts around dawn , with local torrential downpours possible .
lows of 16c ( 61f ) .
heavy showers or thunderstorms remain a risk during rush hour tomorrow but these will clear during the morning to give a cloudy , warm and humid day for most of us with some brighter spells .
highs of 21c ( 70f )
weather has more details .

documents.title: rspca advise on how to deal with 'lost ' kids
text: the rspca has issued advice about how to handle young deer after it was called out to a baby deer that was alone in someone 's garden at market weston , near diss .
officer jason finch was called out to the young roe deer , checked it over and called east winch wildlife centre near king 's lynn for advice .
he said : whilst it may look as though a young deer has been abandoned , actually their mother will only visit them once or twice a day and is out feeding the rest of the time .
this could happen at night which means you 'd almost never see the kid being tended to .

now we are entering into summer it may be more usual to see young deer but unless they are in immediate danger or showing signs of injury we would advise members of the public just to monitor from a safe distance to see if mum returns . ''

documents.title: boy 's treehouse saved from the axe
text: a man 's efforts to save his son 's treehouse have paid off after councillors went against a recommendation to take it down .
chris mack built the den for his son james at his parents ' home in harleston three years ago .
south norfolk council discovered it in december and said it infringed the privacy of neighbouring properties - despite receiving no complaint from neighbours .
the authority 's planning committee said the concerns were not `` sufficient '' enough to warrant removing it .
mr mack said the news was `` unbelievably fantastic '' .
author: Katy Prickett
BBC News

documents.title: sam alger death : club says no major incident after dance night ended
text: i 've spoken to a representative of the venue where the elrow dance night took place about reports of an altercation outside after the event ended .
they have very much played down reports of this .
they said there was no incident to speak of but there were lots of people leaving the nightclub at the same time with people trying to get buses and taxis back to barcelona .
the club nights are very popular with both locals and tourists and the venue is just 15 minutes from barcelona city centre .
author: Guy Hedgecoe
Freelance journalist

documents.title: sam alger death : police probe reports of altercation outside club
text: i 'm a freelance journalist based in spain and i 've been speaking with the local police about sam alger 's death .

they said they 're not ruling anything out but insist that first impressions suggested there were no signs of violence on sam 's body and they 're awaiting the results of an autopsy , the results of which should be known in a few days .
police also told me they found sam 's body in fields surrounded by irrigation ditches .
some of his friends have been posting comments on social media saying that he drowned but police told me there was confusion over what actually happened on sunday night , the night he went missing .
they are also investigating reports of an altercation outside the elrow nightclub venue to see if there 's any connection with sam 's disappearance .
author: Guy Hedgecoe
Freelance journalist

documents.title: former college pays tribute to sam alger
text: easton and otley college has issued a tribute to sam alger , one of its former students found dead near a nightclub in barcelona .
a spokesman said sam was studying on a football learning programme for two years between 2007 and 2009 .
sam was very motivated and high-achieving - we could n't have wished for a better student .
our thoughts and prayers are with his family at this difficult time . ''
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : storms forecast for later
text: it 's cooling down a little since this morning but still humid with storms forecast for this evening .
this was the scene at harleston - the calm before the forecast storms !
these are expected to move in from about 20:00 and remain overnight with much thunder and lightning .
weather has more details .

documents.title: video shows happy crowd at club
text: dj jacky , who had been playing at the elrow club festival attended by sam alger on sunday , has posted this video of the event on twitter .
it shows a large , happy crowd dancing to the music .
mr alger , 25 , of necton , near swaffham , was found dead near the venue , just outside barcelona , yesterday after being reported missing the previous day .
thank you @ twitterid

documents.title: sam alger had been at dance all-nighter
text: as reported earlier , sam alger had last been seen alive outside a venue hosting an elrow dance night .
the elrow brand holds dance events around the world including cities in england and brazil .
saturday night 's event was being held on the outskirts of barcelona and boasted 40 acts and dj sets .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Local Live

documents.title: sam alger 's body 'showed no signs ' of violence
text: freelance journalist guy hedgecoe , based in spain , has spoken to local police in the area where sam alger died .
this is what they told him :
the red pointer on the map below shows the location of elrow , the nightclub where mr alger had been .

documents.title: sam alger death : how other media are reporting the news
text: the mirror newspaper is reporting that sam alger was out with his brother and friends when he disappeared from the spanish nightclub .
the hull daily mail is also covering the story .
mr alger had worked as an intern for hull city fc .
body of missing former hull city intern sam alger found in spain after nightclub trouble :
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Local Live

documents.title: hull city tribute to sam alger
text: hull city fc is among those paying tribute to keen sportsman sam alger , found dead in a field on the outskirts of barcelona .
`` we were saddened to hear of the passing of former intern sam alger .
our thoughts go out to sam 's friends and family at this time .
rip sam , '' it said .
mr alger is understood to have worked for the qatar stars league football association in qatar .
the nightclub he had been at , elrow , is near the autovia de castelldefels highway and the city 's airport .
author: Nic Rigby
BBC News

documents.title: friends 'heartbroken ' after finding body of sam alger
text: we 've been telling you this morning about how a norfolk man was found dead in spain .
friends have spoken on the find sam alger missing in barcelona facebook page of their `` devastation '' at hearing the news .
a post on the page says : `` no-one can quite believe what has happened . ''
it adds : `` sam was one of the kindest , most genuine and loving people anyone could wish to know and to have him taken from us is truly heart-breaking . ''
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Local Live

documents.title: friends 'found body as police arrived '
text: more now on the man found dead after a night out in nightclub near barcelona .
friends of sam alger , 25 have told bbc radio norfolk they found his body as police arrived at the scene .
mr alger had been missing since leaving the club just outside barcelona on sunday night .
originally from necton , near swaffham , norfolk , mr alger worked for a football association in qatar and was in spain with friends for a festival .
author: Tim Addicott
BBC Radio Norfolk

documents.title: body of norfolk man missing in spain is found
text: the body of a man from norfolk who went missing over the weekend in spain has been found .
sam alger , 25 , originally from necton , near swaffham , was last seen outside the elrow club just outside barcelona on sunday night .
a facebook appeal , set up by friends , said mr alger had run into nearby fields when riots began outside the club about 22:00 bst .
the bbc has been told that his body was found at midday local time on tuesday .
a foreign office spokeswoman said : `` we are working with local authorities following the death of a british national in spain . ''
author: Nic Rigby
BBC News

documents.title: weather : cloudy , warm and very humid
text: most places staying cloudy but dry with sunny spells .
feeling very warm and sticky with temperatures reaching 22c ( 72f ) .
heavy rain forecast for this evening .
weather has more details .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: canaries against the newly-promoted - and the newly-relegated
text: september throws up an interesting contrast in games for the canaries .
newly-promoted burton albion ( to norwich on saturday , 24 september , then the following wednesday city travel north to face fellow relegated side newcastle united .
get the full 2016/17 fixture list here .
author: Richard Hancock
BBC Radio Norfolk sport

documents.title: norwich city fixtures : full list
text: after their opening game at blackburn , the canaries have consecutive home games against sheffield wednesday and bristol city before their trip to portman road .
as mentioned , on boxing day city are away at reading , and they 're away again on new year 's eve when they face brentford .

the final weeks of the season see norwich face preston ( away ) , brighton ( home ) and leeds ( away , before finishing the season with a home game against queen 's park rangers on saturday , 7 may 2017 .
here 's the full list .
author: Richard Hancock
BBC Radio Norfolk sport

documents.title: first east anglian derby scheduled for 20 august
text: norwich are provisionally scheduled to play ipswich away in the first east anglian derby of the season on saturday , august 20 - although that date is likely to be switched .
kick off is down for 15:00 , but again , that could change .

documents.title: championship fixture list released
text: norwich city begin life back in the championship with an away tie at blackburn on saturday , 6 august .
the first east anglian derby against ipswich since the 2015 play-offs will be just three games later on the weekend of saturday , 20 august at portman road .
the return derby match at carrow road takes place on saturday , 25 february , although fixtures are subject to change for tv coverage or security concerns .
author: Richard Hancock
BBC Radio Norfolk sport

documents.title: looking ahead to the championship
text: it 's life back in the championship for the canaries following relegation from the premier league last season .
they 'll join newcastle united and aston villa , and among their other opponents will be the newly-promoted teams from league 1 : wigan athletic , barnsley and burton albion .
albion were only promoted to the football league in 2009 .
there will , of course , be the return of the east anglian derby as norwich face ipswich for the first time since beating them in the championship play-off semi-finals in 2015 .
this morning 's list will be subject to tweaks once the tv companies have their
author: Richard Hancock
BBC Radio Norfolk sport

documents.title: norwich hoping for better start - and finish - than last year
text: the canaries will be hoping to make a better start to this season than their premier league dream did last time round .
back then , norwich suffered a 3-1 defeat to crystal palace
and the season did n't end any better as the relegated side were thrashed 3-0 to everton .

documents.title: the clock is ticking
text: norwich city fans can start making plans for next season as the fixture list is released at 09:00 this morning .
the season starts on the weekend of 6 august - fans will be only too aware norwich have n't won an opening day fixture since 2002 .
this time last year the club were in the premier league looking to play crystal palace , where of course they lost at home 3-1 .
fingers crossed they can break the 14-year losing streak .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Local Live

documents.title: the games fans will be looking out for
text: norwich fans will be poised over ceefax ( or something like that ) at 09:00 as the championship fixtures are revealed .

as well as looking out for the opening and closing day matches , fans will be keen to know where they 'll be headed for the ever popular boxing day fixture - last year the canaries suffered a 3-0 set-back at white hart lane .
and , of course , fans will be waiting to see when they take on arch rivals ipswich town

documents.title: big day for norwich - welcome to football fixtures live
text: hello and welcome to norfolk live .
the team are here to bring you all the latest updates as they happen from across the county .
to kick-off ( get it ? )
we 'll be bringing you all the details of norwich 's fixtures in the championship next season - they come out at 09:00 .
if you do n't like footie , do n't panic our normal service will resume once the excitement has died down .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Local Live
